scrape/2020-05-blog-post/extracted/Особые Условия (Special Opportunity)/06 На пустой мостовой
Особые Условия (SPECIAL CONDITIONS) - Страх уйти без сожаления
Особые Условия (SPECIAL CONDITIONS) - Страх уйти без сожаления

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 26, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
I kinda can't really stand how good this tape is. The second I've heard form Moscow's ОСОБЫЕ УСЛОВИЯ, this full length from 2016 is a stone classic. Steady and steadfast dark pop with soaring guitars and a vocal delivery worthy of Bizarro comparisons. There's an EP and a demo that came before this ('14 and '12, respectively), but they were building to Страх Уйти Без Сожаленя, and it was worth the effort. This release is magnificent.  СТРАХ УЙТИ БЕЗ СОЖАЛЕНИЯ
https://shadowsofthenighthighway.bandcamp.com/
